scenario_text.value:
Lopmon’s dead-tired! Don’t push yourself so
hard!

This is too weird, Lopmon. I’m gonna give
Shuuji a piece of my mind.
I’m, I’m fine... I can do it...

I want to do it...! I wanna be stronger, for
Shuuji’s sake...
Why are you going so far...?

Shuuji is special to me... I want... I need
to be useful to him.

Hmm... I get it. I get what Lopmon’s
saying...

How long to do you plan on slacking off?!
Back to work!
Agumon, you’re...not going to stop him?

This is what Lopmon wants. I wouldn’t be able
to stop him...
(Dammit... Is there nothing I can do?)

(Shuuji’s reckless training continues.
Lopmon won’t listen to a word I say.)
